alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland Kleberg; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 9:22PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Duval, southwestern Jim Wells and northwestern Kleberg Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 922 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Concepcion, or 12 miles west of Premont, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingsville, Alice, Premont, Benavides, Ricardo, Ramirez, San Jose, Ben Bolt, Concepcion, Palito Blanco, Realitos, La Gloria, Cruz Calle, Alice Acres and Rios. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 674 and 708. US Highway 77 between mile markers 692 and 702. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Texas.
